title: WordCamp Bhopal
description: WordCamp Bhopal is a community organised WordPress conference that brings together bloggers, developers, designers, artists, small business owners, entrepreneurs, and educators from Bhopal and all across India. On September 24, 2016, the Bhopal WordPress Community will converge in LNCT for WordCamp Bhopal 2016. This is the first time when Bhopal is hosting such a grand event featuring distinguished speakers and a variety of interesting topics covering blogging, designing and development on the WordPress platform.
